doc.field: Records of the Grey Art Gallery and Study Center
Records of the Grey Art Gallery and Study Center

This series contains correspondence between the gallery and artists, lenders, funders, press and patrons; grant applications; exhibit planning materials, including exhibit labels, exhibition checklists, floor plans; research materials from other institutions (including a small number of photographs and slides used for research but not for exhibition); and shipping, transportation, and insurance information; and photographs related to gallery exhibitions. The series also includes press releases, newspaper clippings, pamphlets, brochures, event invitations, exhibition catalogs, posters, postcards, memorandum, artist biographies, a small number of audio cassettes, and transparencies.
Records of the Grey Art Gallery and Study Center
